page.title: 12A typical day
page.content: Of an 11 year old girl: 'I got dressed and went downstairs to have my breakfast, a boiled egg and toast. My mum asked, "Who are you playing with today?" I said, "With Ian because we want to go down to Aunt Joan's to see Samantha and Nicola". When I had finished the washing up, Ian and I went and knocked on their door. We all went into the garden and did handstands and cartwheels. We all then went for a walk. We didn't have to go in for dinner as we didn't feel like a snack. We walked to Broomfield woods and looked round for two hours. At four o'clock we all went in for our tea. Samantha and Nicola weren't allowed out to play after tea so I played until 8 o'clock. I went to bed.'
